name: Drainage Dreams
description:
-- Game Description --

Drainage Dreams is a 2D puzzle-platforming game about a young girl, Erin, who attempts to run away from home and falls deep into the city's ancient underground sewers.

In this prototype, you get to play three different levels that are composed of chase scenes, puzzles, collectible items and many more!

-- From Developers --

We are a group of students from Red River College taking Game Development (Art and Programming), who are passionate in making games that are fun for all! Drainage Dreams was created in completion for our Game Studio course project. The game was designed to be a multi-genre 2D platformer game with each level consisting of different game elements and mechanics that are unique from one another. The development of the current prototype is roughly around 3 months which includes the conceptual phase, implementation phase and the testing phase.

We hope that you all enjoy the game and have a good time with it! Thank you!
